nodes.text: Thades Gorkultok was a male Human living during the Galactic War. By 3630 BBY he became known as the gladiator in the Arena Grand of Zakuul under the title "Breaktown Brawler". That year, Thades was put up against a newcomer known as "the Mysterious Stranger". During the fight in the Arena, he was assisted by his pets King Crush and Mister Ripper, but was defeated in the sixth round of the Arena fights.
Thades Gorkultok appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as the sixth boss of "Eternal Championship".
